meanings.definition: The state or quality of being irrecoverable.
meanings.sent1: The irrecoverablenesses of the lost treasure left the explorers feeling defeated.
meanings.sent2: The irrecoverablenesses of the stolen artwork made its return seem impossible.
meanings.sent3: The irrecoverablenesses of the missing sock led to a comical search around the house.
meanings.sent4: The irrecoverablenesses of time slipping away reminded him to cherish each moment.
meanings.sent5: The irrecoverablenesses of the sun setting painted the sky in vibrant hues.

meanings.definition: The inability to be regained or recovered.
meanings.sent1: She felt the weight of the irrecoverablenesses of her lost childhood innocence.
meanings.sent2: The irrecoverablenesses of the shattered vase made it impossible to repair.
meanings.sent3: The irrecoverablenesses of the melted ice cream cone left a sticky mess on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: The irrecoverablenesses of a broken promise can strain relationships.
meanings.sent5: The irrecoverablenesses of a missed opportunity lingered in his mind.
